EmailTemplate.name: Communities User Reminders
EmailTemplate.subject: TE Connectivity: Not logged into Lead Management Portal in 30 Days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.Name}
You have not logged into the TE Connectivity lead management portal for more than 30 days. Access to the portal will be suspended if you do not log in for more than 60 days.
If you are having issues accessing the portal or no longer require access please contact the TE representative for your region:
EMEA: Steve Bolton (SBolton@te.com) AMER: Sonja Wise (SWISE@te.com) APAC: Geok Seng Tan (gs-tan@te.com) JAPAN: Genki Kato (kato.genki@te.com)
Thank you, TE Connectivity Channel Marketing Team
